noun.description: A person who records and analyzes someone's psychological and behavioral characteristics, so as to assess or predict their capabilities or to assist in identifying categories of people.
examples: psychological profilers are being used to help officers build a picture of the attacker
certain men have been targeted by our profilers and asked to provide DNA samples

noun.description: An instrument or device for making scientific measurements, for example of the atmosphere or physical features.
examples: a wind profiler for winds in the upper atmosphere
pavement roughness may be measured by laser profilers
